channel.title: game stop responding on map change
channel.description: The game stops responding at the map change from c3a1a to the next map. I can not show a mdmp file due to the fact that hl2 stops responding, I have to end the hl2 process in the task manager. I have tried extracting the maps and replace them and that does not work. I have also tried using all the tricks I have learned from playing half life games. and I have been playing them for a long time. about 15 years or so. I do not know if it something with the mod or with my pc.

item.title: game stop responding on map change
item.dc:creator: CrazyJoe
item.description:
The game stops responding at the map change from c3a1a to the next map. I can not show a mdmp file due to the fact that hl2 stops responding, I have to end the hl2 process in the task manager. I have tried extracting the maps and replace them and that does not work. I have also tried using all the tricks I have learned from playing half life games. and I have been playing them for a long time. about 15 years or so. I do not know if it something with the mod or with my pc.
